overview:
Matt Moore is currently focused on the deployment of HealPay.com, which is an innovative billing and debt recovery application utilizing predictive modeling & machine learning.

Matt Moore co-founded Outside Hub Media in 2006 and over the course of 4 years served various executive positions including, Chief Operating Officer & Chief Revenue Officer while additionally maintaining the responsibility as CFO and legal laison. Mr. Moore successfully developed the idea that gave birth to Outside Hub and was instrumental in establishing and executing the Companyâ€™s business model. Mr. Mooreâ€™s initial duties included acquisition of all online inventory through a unique arbitrage model which allowed the Company to sustain a rapid growth rate while sustaining a profit margin in excess of 60%. Mr. Moore also directed the acquisition & development of the first party assets (websites) of the business.

Prior to joining Outside Hub, Mr. Moore was an Asset Manager for NAI Farbman Group for four years. During this time, Mr. Moore managed commercial real estate properties in the Midwest, including some of the largest and most historical office buildings in the City of Detroit, comprised of over two million square feet of office space and nearly three million square feet of industrial real estate at a given time. Prior to relocating to the Midwest, Mr. Moore was an analyst and internal auditor in the Denver office of KPMG primarily working with the firms most prominent client Liberty Media.

Specialties Executive leadership, corporate business planning (start-up or strategic growth), budget development, legal liason, contract law & administration (draft development or legal direct, negotiating terms and achieving objectives creatively), executive fiinancial dashboards & owner/client reporting.
